entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.8°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 8:33 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
